step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movements are generally good. Try to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down more smoothly in a circular motion.
Good job on the circular motion! Ensure you are actively pulling your shoulders back and down with each repetition.
You're doing great with the repetitions! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to inhale deeply as you do this to help with breathing and lymphatic flow.
